docs.lead_paragraph: Mao Tse-tung, Chou En-lai and other experienced leaders sit with a former textile worker, a minority representative and a farmer in a new ruling Politburo announced in Peking yesterday. Members of the Politburo run China on a day-to-day basis.

headline.main: News Summary and Index; The Major Events of the Day International National Metropolitan The Other News Quotation of the Day
